ResourceRemarks.Description: Using a template to create a MySQL server with the **Replica** value is not idempotent. The server is created successfully the first time. However, deploying the template when the replica server already exists returns an error.
Use the `maintenanceWindow` property only when updating an existing flexible server. When creating a new flexible servcer, don't specify values for this property.
